backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short summaries of their purpose.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variable template including backend canister ID settings and optional network config.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DRAFT_LINK.md: Guide explaining deployment checks, canister ID resolution, and valid shareable URL format.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions with OKLCH colors, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry component rendering the ValentineFlow.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Candid interface declaring an empty backend canister service.
frontend/src/canisterId.ts: Functions resolving backend canister ID and network host from environment variables.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Autoplaying background music player with play/pause button UI.
Renders falling heart emojis using the useFallingHearts hook.
Back/next navigation buttons derived from flow order.
GIF renderer with clickable behavior and fallback text on load failure.
Centered card-style layout wrapper for Valentine screens.
frontend/src/features/valentine/content/: Centralized GIF URLs, fallback assets, quiz images, and music file paths.
Defines sequential Valentine screen order with helpers for previous/next lookup.
Defines all static UI strings, quiz questions, and fallback labels used throughout the Valentine feature.
frontend/src/features/valentine/effects/: Custom hook for previewing, validating, applying, and storing a user-provided GIF URL with error handling.
Generates and manages timed falling heart animations with a maximum concurrent heart limit.
Provides a particle burst effect triggered on demand, cleaning particles after a short animation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/screens/: Renders the gift selection screen with GIF preview and buttons to navigate to gift screens.
Displays a congratulations message and GIF with navigation to the gift selection screen.
Shows a cuddle/hug GIF and themed text with navigation controls.
Displays the final surprise GIF, a clickable surprise box, an animated message reveal, and glitter burst effect.
Implements the quiz flow for Gift 1 with GIFs, answer validation, and progression between questions.
Shows a series of affectionate messages with a themed GIF and navigation back to gifts.
Displays a memories-themed GIF and message block with navigation back to gifts.
Renders the Valentine welcome screen with title, message, GIF, continue button, and navigation controls.
Displays the main Valentine prompt with customizable GIF, yes/no interactions, and navigation to the next screen.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Main navigation controller switching between Valentine screens with hearts and music layers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, gradients, and custom Valentine-themed component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wiring QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider around the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, issues, and requirements for redeploying with a new valid IC canister ID.
